subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: The British lightweight hope Amir Khan received the first loss of his professional career when he was knocked out in 54 seconds by Breidis Prescott of Colombia in Manchester, England. Khan, who won the silver medal at the 2004 Olympics, was knocked down twice by left hooks, the second being the decisive blow, as his record fell to 18-1.
